game.title: The Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient Sceptre of Light from the lost temple of the Moon Goddess.
game.description: Legend has it that the Moon Goddess's temple holds a powerful artifact, hidden deep within its crumbling walls. Retrieve the Sceptre and bring hope back to the people.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces and a +1 bonus to charisma

tasks.objective: Gather information about the temple's layout
tasks.description: Speak with the village's oldest inhabitant, Thorne, who may have knowledge about the temple's layout.
Enter the temple and navigate through the treacherous entrance chamber. Be cautious of traps and undead guardians.
tasks.location: The Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess

tasks.description: Solve a complex puzzle to unlock the door leading to the Sceptre. You'll need all your wits about you!
Make haste back to Rumiyah with the Sceptre in hand, and receive your reward.
